thread.title: Chief Digital Officer Forum The Future of Digital Leadership
thread.title_full: Chief Digital Officer Forum The Future of Digital Leadership - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Chief Digital Officer Forum The Future of Digital Leadership
text:
Innovation Enterprise hosts the upcoming Chief Digital Officer Forum taking place in Chicago this November 10 & 11. High-level digital executives unite in Chicago for two days of keynote presentations and interactive panel sessions.
Chicago, IL (PRWEB) October 22, 2015
With a need for strong leadership in digital it’s important to continually reflect and understand the current marketplace. What are the latest opportunities available and how can we achieve continual digital success? The summit aims to explore just that, whilst learning from the experiences and knowledge of digital experts.
Confirmed speakers across the two days include the Chief Digital Officer at Pizza Hut, Chief Marketing Officer at Blackberry, and other experts at companies such as Google, The Huffington Post, The Onion, FOX Sports, ESPN, Groupon & more. Key topics up for discussion include: the need for digital leadership, digital business models, optimizing digital media platforms & more.
Attendees will also be able to access the co-located Digital Ad Innovation Summit – an event focused on the growing area of digital advertising, exploring key areas of data, advertising across platforms, social ads, personalization & more. Speakers include Spotify, Mashable, University of Illinois, Discovery Communications and The New York Times.
“This summit brings together some of the world’s leading digital experts in an open forum of discussion & networking sessions”, explains conference organizer, Maria Maguire. “Attendees can expect to make meaningful connections and explore key themes of digital leadership, digital optimization, digital development & more.”
For more information on the Chief Digital Officer Forum, coming up in Chicago, check out the website here: http://theinnovationenterprise.com/summits/digital-leaders-summit-2015-Chicago
About Innovation Enterprise :
Innovation Enterprise, a CFO Publishing company is an independent business-to-business multi-channel media brand focused on the information needs of Senior Finance, Operations, Analytics, Big Data, Strategy, Digital, Innovation & Sports executives. Products include IE.Summits, ieOnDemand, ieWebinars
